sub_title: Business Process Expert - Sales & Delivery at Royal Philips
summary:
I am a SAP logistical consultant with a good knowledge of SD, MM and PS with very strong communication skills and I am used to work on international projects with roll-outs in several countries world wide. With solid experience and background in an international industrial environment, I have good knowledge of processes and priorities. Implementing and imbedding new processes in a SAP environment in an (international) organisation is my speciality. 
Done almost all possible functions within an implementation from Project manager to Developing and delivering training material.

profile_positions.description:
As a first line helpdesk all daily issues and development requirements that came though from the organization in a complicated modified landscape.
Set up and implement the new IVI 1.4 regulations for car registrations
Tracking and advising management on user roles and authorizations.

I was responsible for the support of all SAP modules used by Kia Motors, including SD, MM, FI, CO, Authorizations & WorkFlow.
From the beginning the idea was that Kia would like to have somebody in permanent employment. As per the first of February 2020 they emplyed somebody and I left after a knowledge transfer session.
profile_positions.title: Sap Support Specialist

profile_positions.description:
The scope of the work was to set up and form the core of the SAP support desk for the entire PLUS organization after go-live and prepare the organization for the changes to come when changing to a SAP system.
Unfortunately the entire project was stopped after a repeated failure of the implementation partner to meet the agreed dead-lines. The whole project will be sent back to the drawing board for a new blue print and a new package selection somewhere in the second quarter of 2019.
profile_positions.title: Senior logistical consultant for setting up of functional support desk

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to stream leads STS and PTP
	• The business was over stretched and could not answer all questions of the project team. As such business analists were added to work between the business and the implementation team. I was responsible for the logistical processes in EWM and in PTP.
• Developing the test plan and develop the test scenario’s .
• Approving of the deliverables from the developers
• Creating user manuals for all approved processes.
• Prepare the organization for the changes that would come with this changing to SAP

Unfortunately the company was not yet ready for implementing SAP and the whole project was stopped.
profile_positions.title: Business analyst on behalf of the Store-to-ship and the Purchase-to-pay teams

profile_positions.description:
• As a BPE I was responsible for translating user / organizational requirements into functional requirements for the Business Analyst to pick up and translate into a technical design..
 • Mapping the European good flows on the approved global good flows.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Expert - Sales & Delivery

profile_positions.description:
Bringing all Agrifirm (largest farmer cooperation in NL) companies / plants into a single template. As a temporary replacement for a permanent position I was asked to fulfil the architect role with Agrifirm until a new suitable person was found. Unfortunaly for me this person was found a lot sooner than expected ending my assignment a lot earlier then originally planned.

Responsibilities: 	Reporting to Functional Information Manager
	• As an architect I was responsible to approve all developments for the incoming and outgoing logistical flows and the Extended Warehouse Management processes.
 • Sparring partner for the functional consultants for all developments in the mentioned fields
	• Bring forward solutions for all outstanding issues in the mentioned processes.
• Make sure all processes are within the Agrifirm template.
• Guard the project planning and make sure all deliverables are actually delivered, up to standard and stored in the right place.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect for all inbound, outbound and EWM processes

profile_positions.description:
Wave 2 of the merge between DE and Mondelez. All Mondelez coffee business needed to merge into the DE SAP system Creating Jacobs Douwe Egbert company. In wave 2 the countries China, South Africa, Russia, Morocco, Ukraine. Kazakhstan, Georgia, Greece, Belarus and Turkey were involved
	
Responsibilities: 	Reporting to Global IT Business Process Manager STP	
	• First contact person / responsible for all MM issues for China and Russia.
•Responsible for the entire implementation of the sub-contracting part of the project .
	• Created Functional Designs for several developments (AO Contracts and Purchase orders, specific Russian payment terms).
• Describe all STP processes for automatic testing purposes.
• Knowledge transfer to users and local consultants.
• Manage workshops and creating the blueprint for China and Russia and all sub-contracting issues.
	• Data migration for Sub-contracting process
	• Setting up new payment terms for MM side for several countries.
	• General STP support work / defect solving 
					• Go live support / after care
profile_positions.title: MM project specialist

profile_positions.description:
Wave 1 of the integration project between Jacobs Coffee (Mondelez) and Douwe Egberts.
Reporting to Global IT Business Process Manager STP	
	•Responsible for the entire implementation of the sub-contracting part of the project .
	• Created Functional Designs for several developments (AO Contracts and Purchase orders).
• Knowledge transfer to users and local consultants
	• Data migration for Sub-contracting process
	• Reviewing / Setting up (new) payment terms for MM and OTC for all wave 1 countries.
	• General STP support work / defect solving 
					• Go live support / after care
profile_positions.title: MM project specialist

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to Information Manager Inflight management	
	• Help users with all forthcoming problems, issues that occur during their daily work. 
	• Monitor the (performance of the) different SAP systems on a daily basis
• Monitor all Idoc traffic between the SAP system and other systems both inside and outside KLM. Intervene there where required.
• Propose process improvements where necessary and where required
	• Review all requests for changes / improvements coming from the business. Translate requirements from the business into solutions in the SAP system. Translating the solutions from the competence center into work instructions for the users. 
	• Implement all new developments in the business.
• Perform testing and user acceptance for all new developments.
• Train existing users and new employees on new and existing processes.
profile_positions.title: Funktional Application Manager SAP

profile_positions.description:
Due to other activities the responsible project manager was busy on other projects or only managed the formal reporting towards steering team. As such I toke over all practical project manager tasks including blue printing, getting consensus with the business concerning requirements, change management, organize testing, setting up and managing actual testing and creating test scripts and masterdata, coordinating the effort for all required modules, getting user acceptance, manage and implement changes, organize workshops with interest groups, defect handling, and after go-live support. Beside that I managed the daily work of 2 Russian developers.
Project Scope:	Building a new Russian entity into the system where all stages of the project from blue-printing till implementation are managed. Particular challenging was that I had to coordinate the work from people in India,, Russia, Italy, Germany, Houston (US) and Rotterdam  in different time zones and different cultures.• Analyzing and collecting all requirements for the new Russian entity. Both legal and process wise 
In short
• Writing all requirements down in Business Requirement Documents for all logistical processes in SD, MM and Tolling operation.
• Obtaining sign-off for all BRD’s from business.
• Preparing and executing demo’s to different interest groups.
• Coordinating all (IT) testing and User Acceptance Testing.
• Writing all the test scripts for all scenario’s, translating the tests scenarios to HP Quality Center. 
• Coordinating all test efforts and managing and coordinating the defect list in HP Quality Center for all modules.
• Creating, coordinating and delivering of all logistical related trainings to end-users in Russia.
• Coordinating all master data related issues and cut over issues
• Post go-live support to users and management. 
• Sparring partner for local Russian management when new requests surfaced.
profile_positions.title: SD / MM / Implementation consultant

profile_positions.description: Working on a very exciting project remodelling the purchasing models for Heineken and its large number of international breweries.. For the first time working with the GTM (Global Trade Management) module and learning a lot about new purchasing models.
profile_positions.title: MM Functional consultant
